explains: n. （尤指拍卖中的）出价；（拍卖时买方）报出的价钱；投标；吩咐，要求；叫牌
v. 出价；投标，竞标；努力争取（bid 的现在分词）
wordGroup: competitive bidding 竞标；竞争性招标
sealed bidding 封标；密封投标

sentences.en: Several companies remained in the bidding.
Of the five companies bidding for the contract, Wall Street analysts have made Lockheed the odds-on favourite.
sentences.cn: 在投标的五个公司里，华尔街分析师认为罗克希德最有可能中标。

sentences.en: A French firm will be bidding for the contract.
sentences.cn: 一家法国公司将投标争取这项合同。
